member.summary: Utility class to assist with Move It integration

member.name: T:MoveItIntegration.IMoveItIntegrationFactory
member.summary: Factory class to get the instance

member.name: T:MoveItIntegration.MoveItIntegrationBase
member.summary: implementation of is required to get instance of this class.

member.name: P:MoveItIntegration.MoveItIntegrationBase.ID
member.summary: unique ID to identify the integration. must not change for the sake of backward compatibility.

member.name: P:MoveItIntegration.MoveItIntegrationBase.Name
member.summary: (future feature) Display name in move it options. if null, The integration will not be added to the MoveIT options.

member.name: P:MoveItIntegration.MoveItIntegrationBase.Description
member.summary: (future feature) Description of the integration item in move it options. if null, no description is displayed.

member.name: P:MoveItIntegration.MoveItIntegrationBase.DataVersion
member.summary: The version of data that can be read later for backward compatibility.

member.name: M:MoveItIntegration.MoveItIntegrationBase.Paste(InstanceID,System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{InstanceID,InstanceID})
member.param: a dictionary of source instance ID to target instance ID. this maps all the nodes, segments and lanes. please contact mod owner if you need buildings, props, etc to be mapped as well

member.name: M:MoveItIntegration.MoveItIntegrationBase.Mirror(InstanceID,System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{InstanceID,InstanceID},System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Paste object data that has been mirrored, with segment ends needing reversed
member.param: a dictionary of source instance ID to target instance ID. this maps all the nodes, segments and lanes. please contact mod owner if you need buildings, props, etc to be mapped as well
Relative angle in radians that instance has been rotated by
Absolute angle in radians of mirror action

member.name: M:MoveItIntegration.MoveItIntegrationBase.Decode64(System.String,System.Version)
member.param: The base 64 string that was encoded in

member.summary: Used by Move It to find integrated mods
